title: Router: Diagnose Unstoppable
description: Routes build failures to unstoppable diagnose loop or stage playbooks.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Fail[build/test/run/publish failed] --> Ev[task.diagnose.collect_evidence.v1]
  Ev --> Cl[task.diagnose.classify_stage.v1]
  Cl -->|high confidence| ByStage[pack.diagnose.minimal_fix.by_stage.v1]
  Cl -->|low confidence| Unstop[pack.diagnose.unstoppable.v1]
  ByStage --> MaybeFix{need fix?}
  MaybeFix -->|yes| Unstop
  MaybeFix -->|no| Wait[pack.diagnose.wait_user.questions_only.v1]
